text: Amadeus Serafini (born July 7, 1990) is an American actor from California. He is known for his role as Kieran Wilcox in the first two seasons of MTV's slasher series Scream. == Career == Serafini started his career with a role in a short film Smoke and a minor role in the short web series Oh La La, Hollywood Speaks French! In 2015, he starred as Kieran Wilcox in the MTV horror series Scream. He guest starred as Josh in the web television series Impulse. In 2018, Serafini starred as Terry in the independent comedy film Summertime. In 2019, he starred as Henry Van Horne in the independent action- thriller Project X-Traction alongside John Cena and Jackie Chan. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
